channel.title: NEED HELP (mac) cant compile
channel.description:
hey guys so my compiler = @echo off javac -classpath deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar:deps/jython.jar:deps/xstream.jar:deps/mina.jar:deps/mysql.jar:deps/poi.jar:deps/slf4j.jar:deps/slf4j-nop.jar -d bin src\server\event\*.java src\server\model\items\*.java src\server\model\minigames\*.java src\server\model\npcs\*.java src\server\model\objects\*.java src\server\model\players\*.java src\server\model\players\skills\*.java src\server\model\players\packets\*.java src\server\model\shops\*.java src\server\net\*.java src\server\task\*.java src\server\util\*.java src\server\world\*.java src\server\util\log\*.java src\server\*.java src\server\world\map\*.java pause
i have tryed javac *.java iv tryed copying it and pasting it and nothing seems to work what am i doing wrong!

item.title: NEED HELP (mac) cant compile
item.dc:creator: @siah_99 siah 99
item.description:
@siah_99 wrote:

hey guys so my compiler =
@echo off
javac -classpath deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar:deps/jython.jar:deps/xstream.jar:deps/mina.jar:deps/mysql.jar:deps/poi.jar:deps/slf4j.jar:deps/slf4j-nop.jar -d bin src\server\event*.java src\server\model\items*.java src\server\model\minigames*.java src\server\model\npcs*.java src\server\model\objects*.java src\server\model\players*.java src\server\model\players\skills*.java src\server\model\players\packets*.java src\server\model\shops*.java src\server\net*.java src\server\task*.java src\server\util*.java src\server\world*.java src\server\util\log*.java src\server*.java src\server\world\map*.java
pause
